title: End-devices or hubs
content: We donâ€™t currently certify items such as Zigbee sticks, Z-Wave sticks, or connecting bridges without matching end devices.

title: Available to the general public
content: If your device is going through a crowd-funding or pre-sale campaign, we will not test it until it is fully funded and in the manufacturing stage.

title: Available locally and not reliant on a separate cloud connection
content: We prioritize local control above everything else. Cloud control can be an extra, but must be opt-in only.

title: Available to access firmware updates directly in Home Assistant
content: Ideally, all devices should be able to access over-the-air (OTA) firmware updates from within our system. If this isn't possible, you must provide a way to alert users about firmware updates.

items.title: Local network or Bluetooth connectivity
items.content: An integration quality of gold or above

title: All devices must have FCC/CE or equivalent certification
content: Above all, partners need to share our values of Privacy, Choice, and Sustainability.
